Description: Fragment of ring foot and bowl of Attic black-glazed pottery bowl; stand-ring has central groove; glazed save for groove at join of wall and foot, and stand-ring. Interior: stamped decoration consisting of band of slightly diagonal rouletting; chain of palmettes; single band and tongue pattern in centre; inscription on underside
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1811)
